cast.name: 娜特慧兰·塔美 Natthaweeranuch Thongmee
翁韦德·答奴翁 Worrawech Danuwong

writer.name: 罗克夏·邦佩奇 Rerkchai Paungpetch

director.name: 罗克夏·邦佩奇 Rerkchai Paungpetch

this_title: แสบสนิท ศิษย์ส่ายหน้า
introduction: Sanit. A noodle chef that try to fulfilled his dream. To be a boxer. His friend Sab, a old school boxer that suffer injury at his leg. Song, a friend who's thinking that Sanit boxing career will never work out. Sit, an old school musician who teach him about step. Finally Sanaw, a person who obsessed about lucky charm. Must help him train to become a greatest boxer of the world, but when his girlfriend. Suay must suffer from tumor that make her blind. Now Sanit must fight and help his girlfriend from permanently blind, and become a real boxer...
foreign_title: แสบสนิท ศิษย์ส่ายหน้า
